name: Wishin' You Were Fishin'
description:
A Fishing Game but without a Fishing Rod

Fishing has been made illegal as of the No Fishing Act 2017, meaning Barney the Fisher is going to have to fish with his bare hands! Hunt fish for money and use your money to purchase weapons and gear in order to obtain the crown jewel of the sea: the Mark Brown fish. But be ready to battle sharks on the way!
